Bop 'n' Block.name: Bop 'n' Block
Bop 'n' Block.blurb: Every so often, Yuumi's next attack against an opponent restores mana and generates a shield. If Yuumi is Attached, the shield protects her ally. The shield protects Yuumi or her ally until it's broken.
Bop 'n' Block.description: Innate: Periodically, Yuumi's next basic attack against an enemy champion gains  50 bonus range and won't use a  projectile. This attack restores 50 − 160 (based on level) mana and grants her a 60 −  400 (based on level) (+ 30% AP)  shield that lasts until it is broken.
Bop 'n' Block.description2: While  Attached, the shield transfers to her Anchor.

Prowling Projectile.name: Prowling Projectile
Prowling Projectile.description: Active: Yuumi fires an errant missile that deals  magic damage to the first enemy hit.
Prowling Projectile.description2: If the missile is in flight for 1 second, it deals increased magic damage, and  slows enemy  champions struck by 20% for 1 second.
Prowling Projectile.description3: While  Attached, Yuumi directs the trajectory of the missile instead for up to 2 seconds before fizzling, during which she and the Anchor can see the effective range.
Prowling Projectile.notes: * Prowling Projectile does not interrupt Yuumi's previous orders.

You and Me!.name: You and Me!
You and Me!.description: Passive: Yuumi and her Anchor gain flat  adaptive force plus a percentage of the Anchor's  adaptive force and a percentage of its bonus attack damage or ability power, whichever is higher, as  adaptive force. Additionally, Yuumi starts with a point in You and Me! and  Prowling Projectile instead has 6 ranks.
You and Me!.leveling:
Adaptive Force:
12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20 (+ 12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20%)

Attack Damage Adaptive Force:
20 / 23.33 / 26.67 / 30 / 33.33% bonus AD

Ability Power Adaptive Force:
12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20% AP
You and Me!.description2: Active: After a 0.25-second channel, Yuumi  dashes to an allied champion and attaches to them. While Attached, Yuumi is  disarmed,  untargetable (except from  turrets and in-flight projectiles targeting her) and follows her Anchor's movement, and retains the ability to cast (except movement spells).
You and Me!.description3: Active - Change of Plan: Yuumi can switch her Anchor at no cooldown, and will detach automatically if her Anchor dies. If re-activated without a valid target, Yuumi will detach from her Anchor and dash up to 250 units in the target direction, triggering the cooldown. The cooldown starts ticking down when attaching to the first ally.
You and Me!.description4: Immobilizing effects on Yuumi places You and Me! on a 5-second cooldown.
You and Me!.notes:
* If Yuumi is attached to an ally that  Teleports, she will detach before the  Teleport completes.
 Her monster aggression transfers to the Anchor.
 The dash is interrupted by any immobilizing crowd control.
 Enemies gain an assist on Yuumi if they damage an attached ally.
 You and Me! gives assists on champion takedowns from her teammates when she first attaches to a participating ally.
 You and Me! will follow an Anchor under stealth, becoming herself stealthed as well. She can cast her abilities without breaking stealth.
 If the Anchor  recalls, Yuumi will detach automatically when they arrive at the fountain.
 If Yuumi is on the blue team, she will remain attached on the southwest side, and if Yuumi is on the red team, she will attach to the northeast.
 Yuumi can dash to zombie state targets (i.e  Sion's  Glory in Death), but she cannot stay attached. 
 Yuumi detaches when going in a  resurrection.

Zoomies.name: Zoomies
Zoomies.description: Active: Yuumi  heals herself and gains 15% (+ 10% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed and bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
Zoomies.description2: While  Attached, the Anchor is targeted by the ability instead.

Final Chapter.name: Final Chapter
Final Chapter.description: Active: Yuumi  recoils X units in the opposite direction, after which Book channels to launch 7 waves over 3.5 seconds, each dealing magic damage. Enemy  champions hit take only 50% damage from subsequent waves, and when struck with three waves, they are  rooted for 1.75 seconds.
Final Chapter.leveling:
Magic Damage Per Wave:
60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 (+ 20% AP)
Reduced Damage Per Wave:
30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 (+ 10% AP)
Maximum Champion Damage:
240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+ 80% AP)
Maximum Non-Champion Damage:
420 / 490 / 560 / 630 / 700 (+ 140% AP)
Final Chapter.description2: Yuumi can move and cast both  You and Me! and  Zoomies during Final Chapter.
Final Chapter.notes:
* The  root can only occur once per target.
 While  attached,  Cloud Dragon Soul will not activate until Yuumi detaches.
